MailBox - Class in PART1
Mailbox Class that has a Store, User and its list of messages

Message - Class in PART1
Class for messages and its operations
Message(String, String, String, String) - Constructor for class PART1.Message
Method that creates a message by a given subject,text,nick from and nick to.

Method that creates a message by a given subject,text,nick from, nick to, and the date when it was created.

Method that returns a List of Messages that have the same subject.

Method that returns a Map of the messages regrouped by Subject.

messagesUsersYear(int) - Method in class PART1.MailSystem
Method that returns a ListOfMessages from users who's birthday is less than the year given by parameter.
messagesUserYear() - Method in class PART1.Phase1Test
Test that compares the number of Messages by adding 2 messages.
